# Funding an Unconf {#money}

After you have your physical space and your website, you need to start finding funding for the event. 

### Possible Sponsors {-}

Use your network! Reach out to current and past employers, ask professors if they know of programs at their university that can assist you, and contact local data science companies. 

### Grant funding possibilities {-}

- R Consortium [RUGS](https://www.r-consortium.org/projects/r-user-group-support-program) 
- NSF [Conferences and Workshops in the Mathematical Sciences](https://www.nsf.gov/funding/pgm_summ.jsp?pims_id=11701) (submit application a minimum of siz months ahead of time)
